Title: SilverlightFTP
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A SilverlightFTP is a silverlight based ftp client for web.

It supports renaming,deleting,uploading multiply files,directory creating
and file downloading. All of this features can be used in parallel mode.

livedemo here(Silverlight 3 only)
http://fudzen.studenthost.ru/SilverlightFTPTestPage.aspx
